title: Before you throw out old, broken tech read this! - WKMG News 6 & ClickOrlando
content: Before you throw out old, broken tech read this!  WKMG News 6 & ClickOrlando
description: Broken laptops, old cell phones, printers that stopped working years ago … Electronic waste is a big problem. One estimate from United Nations’ researchers is that only about 20 percent of it is disposed of properly. Consumer Reports has some advice on how to clear out your tech clutter safely and maybe make a little money.
